ClusterConstant Properties

Requires: VI Scripting

Inherits from Constant. View the class hierarchy.

PropertyDescription
Auto Sizing StyleGets or sets the resizing style of the cluster constant. Details
Elements[]Returns an array of references to the elements of the cluster constant. Details
Horizontal Scrollbar VisibleIf TRUE, displays the horizontal scroll bar. Details
Vertical Scrollbar VisibleGets or sets whether LabVIEW shows the vertical scroll bar. Details
View As IconGets or sets whether LabVIEW displays the cluster constant as an icon. Details
